title.narrative: NEXT STEP for El Adde schooling development

description.narrative: The focus of the new project is to enable high school graduates from El-Adde school to continue their post secondary education in their home region. The whole project is estimates to last nine years. At this point resources for the first three year phase a re being requested. The key objective of the project is to establish vocational school with 2 departments along with continued support and strengthening of the existing high school. During the first phase (2013- 2015) the school infrastructure and school buildings including work-shops will be constructed and furnished/equipped. As a cost saving exercise the existing high school will be expanded to include a vocational school.
